mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio(pot_no, mem_no, pot_subject, pot_description, pot_summary, pot_startdate, pot_enddate, pot_environment, pot_thumbnail, pot_video, pot_source) VALUES(pot_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{pot_subject}, #{pot_description}, #{pot_summary}, #{pot_startdate}, #{pot_enddate}, #{pot_environment}, #{pot_thumbnail}, #{pot_video}, #{pot_source})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.mem_nickname, m.mem_id, m.mem_profile, m.mem_email FROM portfolio p, members m WHERE p.pot_no = #{param1} AND m.mem_no = p.mem_no AND p.pot_status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(com_no, mem_no, pot_no, com_nickname, com_pw, com_content, com_type) VALUES(com_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{pot_no}, #{com_nickname}, #{com_pw}, #{com_content}, #{com_type})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, (SELECT mem_id FROM members WHERE mem_no = c.mem_no) mem_id, (SELECT mem_nickname FROM members WHERE mem_no = c.mem_no) mem_nickname, (SELECT mem_profile FROM members WHERE mem_no = c.mem_no) mem_profile FROM comments c WHERE (c.pot_no = #{param1} AND c.com_status = 1)
